TunableEnum.name: persistence_option
TunableEnum.description: How this situation save/loads. Each option saves the situation into a different place within the save game. The situation may still fail to load if the Sims no longer match their filters, time has passed, or the zone director just says no at the end of it. DONT: This situation will never save load. LOT: This situation will be saved on the lot. This means that it will only be loaded upon returning to this lot. STREET: This situation will be saved on the street. This means that if you travel between different lots on the same street that it will be loaded.

Tunable.name: should_cancel_leave_interaction_on_premature_removal
Tunable.display: Should Cancel Leave Interaction On Premature Removal
Tunable.description: If Checked any leave interaction running or queued on the sim should be canceled if they are removed prematurely from the situation. Any situation that can cause a sim to leave the lot (but not leave lot must run) should have this checked so that the leave interaction can be canceled if the sim is pulled from this situation to be in another situation. My dinner party ends and the guest are leaving. I decide to throw an after hours affair inviting several of the guests who are leaving. I need to cancel their leave interaction so that they will stay.
